errors.private_scrobbles: Your last.fm profile have private scrobbles. Please <1>make them public</1> to continue
errors.rate_limit: There are too many people using this website right now and last.fm is limiting us. Please try again later

first_track.sub_text_zero: This was your first scrobble of the year, on {{date, datetime}}. You only listened this song once this year.
first_track.sub_text_one: This was your first scrobble of the year, on {{date, datetime}}. You only listened this song one more time this year.
first_track.sub_text_other: This was your first scrobble of the year, on {{date, datetime}}. You also listened this song {{count, number}} more times this year.

top_artists.top: And these were the artists you listened the most
top_artists.bottom: counting up to {{count}} artists this year

top_tracks.top: And these were the tracks you listened the most
top_tracks.bottom: counting up to {{count}} tracks this year

top_albums.top: Finally, these were the albums you listened the most
top_albums.bottom: counting up to {{count}} albums this year
